verbs.description: A Hartford parish [V: will] hold a forum on the Trump administration 's termination of a program that granted protected status to immigrants fleeing natural disasters or violence in their home countries .

A Hartford parish will hold a forum on the Trump administration 's termination of a program that granted [V: protected] [ARG1: status] to immigrants fleeing natural disasters or violence in their home countries .
